name: spDescChanger
author: Sebastian Klaus

sections.description: With this Plugin you can set several descriptions for your blog. They change randomized without reloading the page. You will find an example video on the plugin-page at http://www.scriptpara.de/skripte/spdescchanger/
sections.installation:
Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

Be sure, that in your header.php the code is as follows:

< div class=”description”>< ?php bloginfo(‘description’); ? >

The important thing is the class “description”!!

short_description: With this Plugin you can set several descriptions for your blog. They change randomized without reloading the page.
